description:
This table contains procedure-level details about authorizations. The associated authorization information for the procedure can be found in the AUTHORIZATIONS table by joining the tables on the AUTH_ID columns.





Child table AUT_PROC_MODS contains multiple rows of additional information related to each row in this table. You may join to this table on the AUTH_ID columns and AUT_PROC_DETAILS.LINE = GROUP_LINE from that table.

columns.name: AUTH_ID
columns.description: The authorization ID for the authorization record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: PROC_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
Type of procedure information being authorized.  A procedure authorization may be collected for a specific code, a code range, or a procedure component.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Group


Free Text


Range


CPT(R)/HCPCS


Discipline


Default Authorization


Level of Care

columns.name: PROC_RNG_START
columns.description: Starting code of the code range

columns.name: PROC_RNG_END
columns.description: Ending code of the code range

columns.name: PROC_COMP_ID
columns.description: Procedure component being authorized. This column is frequently used to link to the CL_CMP table.

columns.name: REV_CODE_ID
columns.description: Procedure revenue code. This column is frequently used to link to the CL_UB_REV_CODE table.

columns.name: REV_CODE_ID_REVENUE_CODE_NAME
columns.description: The name of the revenue code.

columns.name: PROC_PROV_ID
columns.description: Provider associated with the authorization. This column is frequently used to link to the CLARITY_SER table.

columns.name: PROC_CODE_ID
columns.description: Item to track authorized Current Procedural Terminology (CPT)/Healthcare Common Procedure Coding System (HCPCS) codes.

columns.name: PROC_DISCIPLINE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The Home Health and Hospice discipline category ID for the authorization.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: PROC_LEVELOFCARE_C_NAME
columns.description:
This column stores the hospice level of care that is authorized by this authorization period. This level of care is sourced from the hospice place of service table and is derived from the Medicare-defined list of hospice levels of care.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Routine Home Care


Continuous Home Care


Inpatient Respite Care


General Inpatient Care


Routine Home Care (Days 61+)

columns.name: SRC_PROC_ID
columns.description: Source procedure from which the authorization record has been created.

columns.name: PROC_MED_ID
columns.description: Stores the medication corresponding with the specified medication billing procedure.

columns.name: PROC_SVC_TYPE_CODE_C_NAME
columns.description:
Procedure level service type override.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries:

columns.name: MED_DIRECTOR_REV_REQ_YN
columns.description:
Does the procedure require a medical director review?


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes
